alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued October 03 at 5:06PM CDT until October 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 699 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS OSBORNE PHILLIPS ROOKS SMITH IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEBRASKA GREELEY HOWARD SHERMAN VALLEY IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA ADAMS BUFFALO DAWSON FRANKLIN FURNAS GOSPER HALL HARLAN KEARNEY PHELPS WEBSTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, ARAPAHOE, BEAVER CITY, BELLAIRE, BLADEN, BLUE HILL, CAMBRIDGE, CAMPBELL, CODELL, COZAD, DOWNS, ELWOOD, FRANKLIN, GOTHENBURG, GRAND ISLAND, GREELEY, HASTINGS, HILDRETH, HOLDREGE, HOLLINGER, INAVALE, JOHNSON LAKE, KEARNEY, KENSINGTON, LEXINGTON, LITCHFIELD, LOUP CITY, MINDEN, ORD, ORLEANS, OSBORNE, OXFORD, PHILLIPSBURG, PLAINVILLE, RED CLOUD, ROSEMONT, SCOTIA, SHERMAN RESERVOIR, SMITH CENTER, SPALDING, ST. PAUL, STOCKTON, WILLOW ISLAND, AND WOLBACH.
